participant_1.background:
I live in a tiny house to save money.
I tend bar on the weekends.
I collect single malt scotch.
I listen to blues and jazz.
During the week i go to college to become a lawyer.

participant_2.background:
I love to travel.
My parents are divorced.
My favourite food is ice cream.
I am a college student.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel! I've been to a few different countries, and I'm always looking for new places to explore.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to travel more, but I haven't had the chance yet.
You should definitely do it! It's one of the best ways to learn about new cultures and meet new people.
I know, I know. I'll get there someday.
Good! In the meantime, you can always try to travel locally. There are probably a lot of cool places to visit in your area that you've never been to.
That's true. I'll have to look into that.
Oh, and what about you? What do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to music, and I collect single malt scotch.
That's cool! I love music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to blues and jazz.
Oh, nice! I love jazz. Who are some of your favorite artists?
I like Miles Davis, John Coltrane, and Ella Fitzgerald.
Those are great choices! I love all of them.
Me too! And what about you? What are some of your favorite artists?
I like a lot of different artists, but I mostly listen to The Beatles, Bob Dylan, and The Rolling Stones.
Oh, nice! Those are all great bands.
Thanks! I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! I think it's a good way to get to know someone.
I agree. It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
Definitely
